title: Textile, 1930s
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: hand screen printed on plain weave
inscribed: In pencil on back: F. Kombaum 11 yrs.
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Ella Ostrowsky
description: Brick repeat with slightly slanted rows of an Israeli street scene with people walking on a road, palm trees, and synagogue. Printed in three colors: green, rose, and gold (rose over green for purple) on white ground.
